module.name: EngineFacilities
module.short: Manages different parts of the engine and makes sure they are shut down in the right order
module.descr:
When one part of the engine is started, it should add a reference to the method responsible for cleaning up to the stack. That should normally be done after all dependencies have been initialised.
The goal is to make sure to shut down facilities in the right order and prevent errors on program termination.
